title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.23 - Notification of change in grant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 351.23 - Notification of change in grant

State Regulations
(a) The recipient must be notified of any
change in grant in accordance with this Title. (b) The recipient must be notified of the
right to a fair hearing in accordance with Part 358 of this Title whenever
there is a proposed reduction in, or discontinuance of, or increase in, the
grant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
351.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
